Sentencas: It is common knowledge that efficiency of fuel cells is highest when no electric current is produced while when the fuel cell is really working, the efficiency is reduced by dissipation.
Titulo: Detailed thermodynamic analysis of polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cell efficiency

Sentencas: In this paper the relation between efficiency and dissipation inside the fuel cell is formulated within the framework of classical irreversible thermodynamics of mixtures.
Titulo: Detailed thermodynamic analysis of polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cell efficiency

Sentencas: It is shown that not only dissipation influences the efficiency but that there are also some other terms which become important if there are steep temperature gradients inside the fuel cell.
Titulo: Detailed thermodynamic analysis of polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cell efficiency

Sentencas: Indeed, we show that the new terms are negligible in polymer-electrolyte membrane fuel cells while they become important in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Detailed thermodynamic analysis of polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cell efficiency

Sentencas: In summary, this paper presents a formulation of non-equilibrium thermodynamics of fuel cells and provides analysis of efficiency in terms of processes inside the fuel cells, revealing some new terms affecting the efficiency.
Titulo: Detailed thermodynamic analysis of polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cell efficiency
